title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST/CLI API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally on macOS, Linux & Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same features as the Python client (chat, generate, embeddings, etc.).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (React/Flask) for chatting with Ollama models, managing models, multi-user support, markdown, code highlighting.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI (Go) with chat REPL, model listing, pulling and conversation persistence.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that adds a GitHub-Copilot-like panel powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama (Kotlin friendly) offering sync/async APIs, streaming, and embedding endpoints.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, pull, delete and streaming.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Open-WebUI, Postgres for persistent chat history.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# .NET client (NuGet: Ollama) with async chat, generate, embeddings and SSE streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local LLM power to any server using Ollama backends.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot (Go) that answers DMs and mentions via Ollama models; easy one-binary deploy.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Clean Next.js chat interface for Ollama with Markdown, code copy, and dark mode; deploy to Vercel in 1 click.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Curated collection of ready-to-run Modelfiles for Llama 2, CodeLlama, Mistral, Zephyr, Solar, etc.

title: ollama-gpt4all
summary: Community repo porting GPT4All models to Ollama Modelfiles for easy local usage.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + LangChain for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-digitalocean-1-click
summary: DigitalOcean 1-Click App to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU workers and Open-WebUI pre-configured.
